response.overview: Julia Ioffe’s candid, full interview on Putin and allegations of Russian interference in the 2016 U.S. election – part of FRONTLINE’s media transparency project for our investigation, “Putin’s Revenge.” Conducted on June 12 and June 14, 2017 with FRONTLINE's Michael Kirk.  Julia Ioffe is a Russian-American journalist for The Atlantic, where she covers politics and world affairs.
response.title: The Putin Files: Julia Ioffe (interview)
